events.message: The customer reported a car collision that happened on May 9th, 2024, resulting in significant damage to the right front bumper and headlight.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report specifying it involved a vehicle collision.
A claims agent was assigned to the case to manage the process and provide status updates to the customer.
The insurance company has officially acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the investigation will commence promptly.
The claims agent requested a copy of the police accident report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a medical bill related to the accident injuries.
The customer submitted all requested documents including the accident police report, medical bills, and vehicle repair estimates.
The investigation into the claim has started, including verification of the accident details and examination of the submitted evidence.
The investigation was concluded confirming the accident details and validating the damage claims made by the customer.
A settlement amount covering the vehicle repairs and medical expenses has been proposed based on the investigation findings.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the offer and the claims process so far.
The claim was approved after the customer accepted the settlement proposal, authorizing the release of funds.
Payment was issued to cover the agreed settlement including auto repairs and medical bills as per the approved claim.
The claim was formally closed after confirming the customer received payment and all outstanding issues were resolved.
The claim file was archived in the system to maintain records for future reference and audit purposes.
